task.title: How do I start sharing my screen with another person?
task.shortdesc: It is easy to start an Instant Share session to share all or part of your screen, or an application, with your colleagues. To use Instant Share, your administrator must install Sametime Communicate and Sametime Conference.

taskbody.context: If you have Instant Share, it is available from HCL Sametime Connect or HCL Notes, not from chat rooms and broadcast communities in a browser.

step.cmd: Select the contact with whom you want to share your screen.

entry.p: Click the name of an online contact, or open a chat window with one or more chat partners.
Click Sametime Contacts icon Sametime Contacts to open the Contacts panel in the Notes sidebar. Then, click the name of an online contact, or open a chat window with one or more chat partners.

step.cmd: Click in the chat window or click Click for a menu of Options for a menu of options from the contact list action bar. Then, click Instant Share and select which part of your screen you want to share (Share an application, Share My Entire Screen, and Share a Region).
step.stepresult: The people that you selected in step 1 receive an invitation to join the Instant Share session.

taskbody.result:
After you start the Instant Share session, a floating palette displays. This palette provides screen share controls to stop screen sharing, let others control your screen or for you to reclaim control, and to share other parts of your screen. It also shows who is participating in the Instant Share session. Click expand arrow next to Participants to see a list of participant names.
If you selected to share a region of your screen, an orange frame outlines the area of your screen that other participants see. Click and drag to resize or move the area of your screen to share.
Participants in an Instant Share session also see a frame around what on the screen is being shared. Sometimes the shared region is bigger than the frame. In this case, click and drag within the shared frame to see the rest of the shared screen.All screen share participants must be from the same server community and use a Sametime Connect client that supports Instant Share. In addition, contacts must not have an availability status of Do Not Disturb to participate in an Instant Share session.
